colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES RDO RJE SDER MO'I GZUNGS MDO DANG 'BREL ZHING YI DAM BSRUNG MA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAS PHYIR BZLOG BYED TSUL PHAS RGOL 'JOMS PA'I RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, HAL HA GA-YON RU'I PHYOGS TA'I CHING DZA SA MGON DKAR SKYABS KYI BLA MA MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN LDAN AA CHI THU BLO BZANG @007B BRTZON 'GRUS DANG, DAD LDAN AUS DZENG THAS JIS 'CHI MED GNYIS KYIS BSKUL ZHING, LHAG PAR BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG MI RJE DAM PA AER TE NI AA HAS DZA SAG RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE'I RIM GROR NYER MKHO'I BSKUL MA BYUNG ZHING, 'DI 'DRA'I LAG LEN YOD MED MTHONG THOS SU MA GYUR CING, GDUGS DKAR KYI GZUNGS MDO'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL YIG RNYING DANG GSAR BRTZOM MANG DU BZHUGS PA DE BZHIN, 'DIR YANG DE'I RIG 'DRA SBYOR RUNG DAM SNYAM 'ON KYANG GZUNGS MDO KHO NA LA BSTEN NAS BYAR RUNG MI RUNG THE TSOM MCHIS KYANG` RANG GI YI DAM CHOS SKYONG GI 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAS GZUNGS MDO DANG BSTUN PA'I RIGS 'DRA SBYOR RUNG BAR SEMS SHING, MO BYA MKHAN GYI LUNG BSTAN DU 'KHRUL BA'I DON GNYER CAN MANG DU MCHIS KYANG LAG LEN RNAM DAG BYED MKHAN SU YANG MA MTHONG THONG 'JAM DPAL RDO RJES MDZAD CES KHA GA-YAR BA'I RDO RJE SDER MO'I BZLOG BSGYUR DU GRAGS PA DE NI MDOS GLUD KYI NGAG 'DON LA BZLOG TSIG KHUNG MED SNA TSOGS SHIG BRIS 'DUG PA MDOS GTOR KYI RNAM DBYE MI SHES PA'I RANG BZHIN LAS MA 'DAS PAS, GZUNGS MDO RANG GI GZHUNG DON DANG MTHUN CING DPYAD BZOD PA'I KHUL DU BYAS TE RANG @008A *, , GZHAN LA PHAN SEMS KYIS KUN NAS BLANGS TI AA CHI THU AER TE NI MER GEN MKHAN PO CHOS RJE SNGAGS 'CHAN DGE 'DUN SENG GE CES MING DON YA BRAL 'CHANG BA'I GYI NA PAS BSDEBS PA'O,, ,,)
